Matthew Jordan
blog

Matthew Jordan

I study the history and science of human thought, to understand how the heck anyone ever figured anything out. I’m midway through a Master’s in the history of science at Oxford, researching AI in the ’50s-‘80s. I have an MSc in experimental psychology from Oxford, and I previously studied math & physics in McMaster University’s ultra-interdisciplinary Arts & Science program. I also help run experiments that probe the nature of geometric intuitions at at NYU’s Lab for the Developing Mind.
